title: Lotto results - winning National Lottery and Thunderball numbers for Wednesday
text:
No-one has won big in tonight's UK National Lottery draw, meaning we now move on to Saturday and a quadruple rollover.

A whopping £8.7million jackpot was up for grabs tonight, but next Saturday will be even bigger - with an £11.2million jackpot.

It may not be in the same league as the £170million Euromillions prize won on Tuesday night - but these jackpots are big by UK Lotto standards.

Tonight was a triple rollover and we brought you the results here as soon as the draws were made. Scroll down through our live blog to get all the numbers and details from both the draws.

The National Lottery main draw took place at 8pm, and the Thunderball draw was at 8.15pm.

In the Thunderball you had the chance to win £500,000.

In case you missed it - the winning numbers in last Saturday's National Lottery draw were -

4, 8, 12, 13, 32, 34 and the bonus ball was 58.

While the Thunderball numbers were -

1, 16, 23, 28, 29 and a Thunder Ball of 14.

What with all the excitement of a single ticket holder winning the largest ever UK Euromillions win yesterday , interest was high in tonight's UK draw. Sadly Camelot confirmed no-one has won.

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

Meanwhile no-one has yet come forward to claim the Euromillions prize from Tuesday.

Thunderball takes place every Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday.
description: Tonight's UK National Lottery was a triple rollover with a jackpot worth playing for - but now we move onto Saturday and a quadruple rollover
